what_are_cookies.title: What are cookies?
what_are_cookies.description: A cookie is a small text file that a website stores on your computer or mobile device when you visit the site. Cookies can be used by websites to improve the user experience.
what_are_cookies.host_domain: Host domain cookies are cookies stored by the website you are currently visiting. Only this site can read them. Additionally, the site may use external services that also store their own cookies, known as third-party cookies.
what_are_cookies.persistent: Persistent cookies are cookies stored on your computer that do not automatically delete after closing the browser, unlike session cookies which do.
what_are_cookies.purpose_1: Their purpose is to allow the website to retain information about your settings (like username, language, etc.) for a set time.
what_are_cookies.purpose_2: This way, you don't have to re-enter them during one visit to the website.
what_are_cookies.purpose_3: Cookies may also be used to compile anonymized statistics about our website usage.

manage_cookies.title: How can you manage cookies?
manage_cookies.description: You can manage/delete cookies at your discretion - details can be found on the website

adjust_settings.title: Adjust cookie settings
adjust_settings.description: Modify your cookie storage settings and permissions

remove_cookies.title: Remove cookies from device
remove_cookies.description_1: By clearing your browsing history in your browser, you can delete all cookies stored on your device. This removes all cookies from all visited websites.
remove_cookies.description_2: Note, however, you may lose some saved information (e.g., saved login data, website preferences).

block_cookies.title: Blocking cookies
block_cookies.description: Most modern browsers can be set to block all cookies from being stored on your device; however, you may have to adjust some preferences manually on each visit. Some services/features may also not function properly (e.g., logging in).

our_cookies.title: Cookies on {domain}
our_cookies.description: We care about your privacy and therefore use only cookies necessary for proper site operation, or those that help us improve our services by measuring website traffic. Our cookies contain anonymized data. You can view the list of used cookies in the table below.

session.name: session
session.description: Every user visiting the site receives a unique identifier. This identifier is necessary for the shopping cart function for non-logged-in users. It also contains login tokens necessary for login and account security.

cc_cookie.name: cc_cookie
cc_cookie.description: This cookie stores the user's consent status with using cookies for the current domain.

ga.name: _ga
ga.description: This cookie is used by the Google Analytics service to distinguish unique users by assigning a randomly generated client ID.

ga_star.name: _ga_*
ga_star.description: This cookie is used by the Google Analytics service to maintain session state.

google_analytics.title: Google Analytics
google_analytics.description_1: This site uses Google Analytics 4 service provided by Google, Inc. ("Google"). Google Analytics uses cookies (link to cookie usage statement). Information about site usage along with cookie content will be transmitted to and stored on servers in the United States. Google uses this information to evaluate site usage and generate activity reports for the site operator and provide related internet services. Google may also provide this information to third parties if required by law or if these third parties process the information on Google's behalf.
google_analytics.description_2: Google Analytics 4 does not record your IP address, thus you are anonymized as a user.

order_status_messages.1-NEW: Thank you for your order! We will check your order immediately and confirm it by email sent to the address you provided during ordering.
order_status_messages.2-CONFIRMED: We have no recorded payment for your order yet. If you already paid the order, please contact us via
order_status_messages.3-PAID: Your order has been paid and is being processed. It will soon be queued for production and shipped within a few days.
order_status_messages.4-IN_PRODUCTION: We are actively working on your order producing the goods you ordered. It should be shipped within a few days.
order_status_messages.5-AWAITING_SHIPMENT: Your order is ready for shipment. We will send it today or on the next business day.
order_status_messages.5-AWAITING_TAKEOVER: Your order is ready and awaiting pickup at our store.
order_status_messages.6-SHIPPED: Your order has been shipped. Expect delivery on the next business day after dispatch, or up to 2 days in exceptional cases.
order_status_messages.7-DELIVERED: Your order has been delivered and should be in your hands now.
order_status_messages.8-CANCELLED: Your order has been cancelled. Please contact us if you have any questions.
order_status_messages.9-COMPLAINT: Your order has been marked as a complaint. Please contact us if you have any questions.
order_status_messages.9-COMPLAINT_RESOLVED: The complaint has been resolved. Please contact us if you have any questions.
order_status_messages.9-ARCHIVED: Your order has been archived as completed.

how_to_shop.title: How to Shop
how_to_shop.intro: Shopping on this site is simple, but we have prepared a guide for you on how to do it:
how_to_shop.step_1:
In the product list, find the product you are interested in.

After clicking on the product, you can read a detailed description or view photos of the product.
how_to_shop.step_2: If you decided to buy a specific product, choose one of the offered variants or color combinations and then click the "Add to cart" button and fill in the form with your requirements for the manufactured product.
how_to_shop.step_3:
At any time, you can go to your shopping cart by clicking the shopping cart icon on the top right panel.

In the cart, you can adjust its contents and make changes (change quantity, requests, note for the seller).
how_to_shop.step_4: When you are satisfied with your selected products in the cart, you can proceed to edit delivery details for the order using the "Continue to delivery details" button.
how_to_shop.step_5: Next, you will have the option to log in, register, or continue with a "one-time order" without registration. After clicking, a form with delivery details will appear to be used for order processing. After filling in your delivery details, you can proceed to select the shipping method and payment method using the "Continue to shipping" button.
how_to_shop.step_6: After selecting the shipping and payment method, you can proceed to the summary of your order using the "Continue to summary" button.
how_to_shop.step_7:
On this page, you can check your order contents and all entered data before submission.

If you find a mistake, you can go to edit the respective section using the "Edit" button shown near that section.
how_to_shop.step_8:
Read our Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions.

Express your consent by checking the boxes "I agree with the Privacy Policy" and "I agree with the Terms and Conditions."
how_to_shop.step_9: Then you can submit a binding order by clicking the "Submit order with payment obligation" button.
how_to_shop.step_10:
We will inform you about further steps and order status by email messages to the email address you provided in the "Delivery details" section.

You can track your order status anytime at the "Order status" page.

maintenance.title: Site maintenance
maintenance.message: The {domain} e-shop is temporarily unavailable due to technical reasons. All existing orders will be processed at the agreed date.
maintenance.contact_info: If needed, you can contact us by phone at

washing.1: Hand wash only, gentle handling, max water temperature 40°C.
washing.30: Machine wash at max 30°C with normal mechanical action. Normal rinsing and spinning.
washing.31: Machine wash at max 30°C with reduced mechanical action. Normal rinsing and gentle spinning.
washing.32: Machine wash at max 30°C with severely reduced mechanical action. Gentle rinsing and gentle spinning. Do not wring by hand.
washing.40: Machine wash at max 40°C with normal mechanical action. Normal rinsing and spinning.
washing.41: Machine wash at max 40°C with reduced mechanical action. Normal rinsing and gentle spinning.
washing.42: Machine wash at max 40°C with severely reduced mechanical action. Gentle rinsing and spinning.
washing.60: Machine wash at max 60°C with normal mechanical action. Normal rinsing and spinning.
washing.61: Machine wash at max 60°C with reduced mechanical action. Normal rinsing and gentle spinning.
washing.95: Machine wash at max 95°C with normal mechanical action. Normal rinsing and spinning. Suitable for white cotton and laundry.

whitening.0: Do not bleach with chlorine-releasing agents.
whitening.1: May be bleached with all bleaching agents.
whitening.2: May only be bleached with oxygen/non-chlorine agents.

drying.1: Tumble dry at low heat (more care needed).

ironing.0: Do not iron. Steaming or processing with steam not allowed.
ironing.1: Iron at max sole-plate temperature 110°C without steam. Ironing with steam may cause irreversible damage.

chemical_cleaning.0: Do not dry clean. Stains cannot be removed by organic solvents.
